skill.name: javascript-testing-patterns
skill.description: Implement comprehensive testing strategies using Jest, Vitest, and Testing Library for unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing with mocking, fixtures, and test-driven development. Use when writing JavaScript/TypeScript tests, setting up test infrastructure, or implementing TDD/BDD workflows.

skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: The skill is static documentation with testing examples. It includes sample code that references network requests and environment variables, but it does not execute code. Risk is low and limited to instructional content.

content.user_title: Build strong JavaScript tests with proven patterns
content.value_statement: Testing gaps slow releases and hide regressions. This skill gives clear patterns and templates for unit, integration, and frontend tests.
actual_capabilities: Show unit test patterns for functions and classes
Demonstrate mocking modules and dependency injection
Show integration testing patterns for APIs and databases
Show Testing Library patterns for React components and hooks
limitations: Does not run tests or execute code
Does not modify project files or configs
Does not set up CI pipelines
Uses example endpoints and data only

use_cases.title: Test React components
use_cases.description: Apply Testing Library patterns for components and hooks with clear assertions.

use_cases.title: Test API services
use_cases.description: Build integration tests for REST endpoints, database access, and error handling.

use_cases.title: Standardize test practices
use_cases.description: Align team on Jest and Vitest patterns, mocking, and coverage targets.

prompt_templates.title: First unit test
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a Vitest test for add and divide functions. Use Arrange Act Assert and include an error case for divide by zero.

prompt_templates.title: Mock a module
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to mock nodemailer in Vitest and verify sendMail is called with to, subject, and html.

prompt_templates.title: Integration test plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft supertest integration tests for POST and GET user routes with setup, teardown, and status assertions.

prompt_templates.title: Testing strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Propose a testing strategy for a TypeScript app with unit, integration, and component tests. Include coverage goals and fixtures.

output_examples.input: Give me a testing plan for a Node API with a React UI.
output: Unit tests for services and utilities
Integration tests for API endpoints with database setup
Component tests for key UI flows
Coverage targets and test scripts for CI

best_practices: Use descriptive test names and AAA structure
Mock external systems to keep tests fast
Test error paths and edge cases
anti_patterns: Testing implementation details instead of behavior
Sharing state between tests without reset
Using real external services in unit tests

faq.question: Which tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: It targets Jest, Vitest, and Testing Library for JavaScript and TypeScript projects.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance and examples only and does not run tests or change your code.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my CI pipeline?
faq.answer: It can suggest scripts and coverage goals, but you must add them to your CI workflow.

faq.question: Does it access my files or data?
faq.answer: No. The content is static guidance and does not read files or environment variables.

faq.question: What if my tests fail to run?
faq.answer: Check your test runner config, dependencies, and Node version, then align paths to your project.

faq.question: How is it different from generic advice?
faq.answer: It includes concrete patterns and templates tailored to modern JavaScript testing tools.
